QuestData.Title: Clefthoof Training: Riplash
QuestData.Description: Now plenty of mounts have been known to run away at the sight of a fierce predator. Way out in the desolate cliffs of Gorgrond, they've got some of the fiercest.$B$BLet's put your talbuk to the test. See if the two of you can't take down the mighty raptor known as Riplash.
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat Riplash while riding your Clefthoof-In-Training.
